data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Jaén, Andalucía, Spain.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jaén, Andalucía, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Jaén, Andalucía, Spain need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 62 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Jaén, Andalucía, Spain who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Jaén, Andalucía, Spain to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the South Asian, general people.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 10,725 believers living in the county of Jaén. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Jaén, Andalucía, Spain.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the county of Jaén, Andalucía, Spain has a population of 669,800.

We estimate Jaén has 10,725 people who might know Jesus, 507,095 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 151,980 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 10,725 believers in Jaén, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
